title: BRIEF-Pipestone Energy Corp Issues Long Term Incentive Awards
text:
BRIEF-Pipestone Energy Corp Issues Long Term Incentive Awards

Stock Markets 21 minutes ago (Sep 03, 2019 23:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Pipestone Energy Corp Issues Long Term Incentive Awards Sept 3 (Reuters) - Pipestone Energy Corp : * PIPESTONE ENERGY CORP. ISSUES LONG TERM INCENTIVE AWARDS * PIPESTONE ENERGY- ISSUED 120,000 RESTRICTED SHARE UNITS AND 180,000 PERFORMANCE SHARE UNITS TO A NEWLY-HIRED OFFICER OF COMPANY UNDER LONG TERM INCENTIVE PLAN FOR CO * PIPESTONE ENERGY- ALLOWS FOR ISSUANCE FOR A TOTAL OF 17,066,070 COMMON SHARES ISSUABLE TO PIPESTONE ENERGY'S DIRECTORS, OFFICERS, EMPLOYEES AND CONSULTANTS PURSUANT TO AWARD

BRIEF-Pipestone Energy Corp Issues Long Term Incentive Awards
description: BRIEF-Pipestone Energy Corp Issues Long Term Incentive Awards
